sentences.sContent: A bit of her naked arm is visible between the buff leather of the gauntlet and the sleeve of her gown; and as the day wears on its feminine smoothness becomes scarified by the stubble, and bleeds.
sentences.sContent_eng: A bit of her naked arm is visible between the buff leather of the gauntlet and the sleeve of her gown; and as the day wears on its feminine smoothness becomes scarified by the stubble, and bleeds.
sentences.sCn: 在她衣服的袖子和暗黄色软皮手套之间，看得见有一截裸露的胳膊露在外面；这一天慢慢过去了，女孩儿圆润的胳膊也被麦茬刺破了，流出了鲜血。

words.tran: [计] 缓冲区；缓冲器，[车辆] 减震器
